txt.en: Challenge: Sâri-surma -- Survival
You have defeated Drugoth
A Guardian of Drugoth has been defeated

Drugoth the Death-monger has relocated from the Misty Mountains and made his new home in the largest iceberg in the Icebay of Forochel. Now, his mad, rambling mind is planning an attack on Annúminas to the south.  \n\nYou must stop this attack before it happens. Proceed through the fortress and reach the summit of the glacier. Follow Drugoth, and put an end to his devious plot.

Having killed Drugoth's captains, you have reached the top of the iceberg and blocked the Death-monger's escape. You must defeat Drugoth as quickly as possible, while avoiding the interference of his two guardians.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This challenge quest will fail if either guardian is defeated.</rgb>
'Storms, aid me in defeating these rebels!'
Reach the summit of Sâri-surma
'How is this possible? I will defeat you myself then! Come, fight me atop the iceberg!'
You have reached the summit
Defeat Drugoth
Do not defeat either of Drugoth's Guardians
'You have destroyed my sloth?'
'I shall have my revenge!'

Having discovered Drugoth's secret citadel, you must clear it of all threats. An ancient iceberg has been made into a breeding ground for the Dead.  \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest will be cancelled if you leave Sâri-surma before completing it.</rgb>
'You have come to the top and to the end, [placeholder].'
'A long cold journey it has been, and sadly for you, a fruitless one.'
<rgb=#d2691e>Wil Wheatley enters the snowy arena!</rgb>
'Your life will end now. But at least you will join my army in death. Take solace.'
<rgb=#d2691e>Grimey Proudfoot enters the snowy arena!</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>Coldbear awakes....</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>Olwir enters the snowy arena!</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>Saija enters the snowy arena!</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>Drugoth sends in reinforcements</rgb>
'I will not shed this body so easily!'
<rgb=#d2691e>You have defeated one of Drugoth's Captains! (1/4)</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>You have defeated one of Drugoth's Captains! (2/4)</rgb>
'Welcome, friends. You are disturbing my plans. This will not do.'
'What has happened?'
<rgb=#d2691e>You have defeated one of Drugoth's Captains! (3/4)</rgb>
<rgb=#d2691e>You have defeated all of Drugoth's Captains! (4/4)</rgb>
'It is time to use your own powers against you! Prepare for the full force of my fury!'
'Osan, take care of these pests before they cause any more damage!'
